Name: Mars City
About the game: In order to teleport from one area to the other use thumbstick on any of the controllers. You can also move by walking in the real world. The application shows a Mars Station located at Gale Crater on Mars. Around the station there are located some Items like a rover and Space Module. The user is inside a SpaceSuite. There are foreseen future version of the application with more items and other features.
